nodes.speaker: narrator
nodes.text: There he is, the famous referee, Cannoloco. They say he’s the toughest cookie in the oven. Better approach him carefully, or you might end up in deep dough.

nodes.speaker: referee
nodes.text: Mi compá, are you excited for the match? Top notch fighter, straight from the hot tray.

nodes.speaker: player
nodes.text: I’m dough-lighted to see you, and of course I'm excited for the match! Now let’s talk business, shall we?

nodes.speaker: referee
nodes.text: Alright, I'm going to be real with you because what I'm about to say can only be betweeen us. {fighterA} and {fighterB} are planning to rig this fight because both are in need of chips for their...let's say certain addictive powder.

nodes.speaker: referee
nodes.text: You think you butter me up? I’ve blown whistles for bigger dough boys than you.

nodes.speaker: player
nodes.text: You looking abit rough lately, think I have exacly what you need.

nodes.speaker: referee
nodes.text: You got me there, and I'm going to be honest with you. Life is a bit rough right now so I could use some.

nodes.speaker: referee
nodes.text: Well, would you look at that. I was fooling around and here you are trying to butter me up.
